name: DeviantArt
description: DeviantArt is an online platform for artists. It enables users to share their artwork with others and receive feedback. DeviantArt offers extensive support for RSS feeds, it is possible to query in various different ways.

feedFormulas.name: User deviations
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the **deviations**, i.e. posts of a DeviantArt user.

feedFormulas.name: Query
feedFormulas.description: This feed contains the most popular deviations in a specific category.

username.name: Username
username.description: The username of the DeviantArt user.
